divs: Sighting DetailsHeard a noise that sounded like the jake brake on a diesel truck. Looked up and the cigar shaped object with lights passed straight over very low and fast. The object gradually went below the horizon and I lost sight.
Summary: Saw cigar shaped object with yellow/orange lights.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pell City
There were no other sightings in Pell City on or around December 1st 2012
